title: Characters Font Foundry now has a RSS 2.0 feed
content:
—  
Characters Font Foundry { Dutch typography to express yourself }

[http://www.characters.nl/rss/rss.xml](http://web.archive.org/web/20060525024217/http:/www.characters.nl/rss/rss.xml) — Syndicate to the feed and we’ll inform you about new releases, font updates, Characters in use and interesting promotional news.

Also visit the font [BLOG](http://web.archive.org/web/20060525024217/http:/www.characters.nl/blog/)
author: Miss Tiffany
